column1: #WalmartContest . After using many different moisturizers for my extremely dry face. This is my favorite. It goes on so smoothly and instantly feels amazing on your skin. I saw results right away and continue to see them each day I use this product

I was fooled by the package it says actual size , the box has filler in it and the jar ivery small note it is .5 oz it is a trial size . When I opened the jar it is only half full. As far as product I cannot comment but I hate to get tricked.
